Author: mrnmy2811
Text: I knows horrible to hear. But they mean it well. Sometimes people just don't know what to say. It's a default response to say something like 'you look well'. If it makes you feel better, all my friends and family said things like that at the start of my recovery, and they've since told me I absolutely did not look well, I still looked sick, they just didn't know what else to say to me.
